pages.text: There is a new dimension on Terra. In order to get there, you must build a portal, on the next page you can see what it should look like. After its construction, you must set fire to a block of gold with a flint and steel. This world does not contain any minerals, but it is very beautiful and full of various building blocks.
Build a portal closer to the spawn, because if you build a portal too far, then when you get into the world of eden, you will die.
